1.title: Aca-Gods
1.plot: Two rival A Cappella teams bring in professional coaches to give them an edge for the Summer A Cappella season. These coaches only have 8 weeks to get these teams into shape before the finals of the Summer Invitational.

2.title: Will they stay wo?
2.plot: The teams take on two new competitors for the second week of the Summer A Cappella Season.

3.title: This Is Aca-War!
3.plot: It's the 3rd week of the Summer A Cappella Season and Stay Tuned is off to a rough start when they learn that half their team won't be able to make it to this week's competition. Meanwhile, Coach Diana takes a huge risk by giving the lead solo to an unexpected member of Highlands Voices, causing the rest of the team to struggle when they realize they have to learn new skills in order to make the song work.

4.title: The Cruella of a Capella
4.plot: It's the 4th week of the Summer A Cappella Season and things start off with a bang. The members of Highlands Voices decide to push back at on Diana's methods, which could collapse the whole team. Meanwhile, Stay Tuned's natural talent is threatened by a natural disaster!

5.title: Eliminations Begin
5.plot: This week brings the first elimination round of the Summer Invitational leading to higher stakes than ever. Highlands Voices continues to disagree with some of Diana's choices while Stay Tuned is lacking the confidence they need to nail their next performance.

6.title: Rise of the Underclassmen
6.plot: In the second week of elimination, Diana and the Highland Voices will do whatever it takes to remain in the competition. Meanwhile, Deke and Stay Tuned go for a risky song that represents an iconic high school experience.

7.title: Deke Plays with Fire
7.plot: Deke tries a new tactic and decides to play it safe in the semi-finals of the Summer Invitational. Meanwhile, Diana is hoping to take her group to the next level with some professional help. With an elimination on the line, which coach will have the winning strategy?

8.title: It A-Comes Down to This
8.plot: With the Summer Invitational Championship finally within reach, Diana and the Highland Voices are throwing everything they have into the final competition to attempt to take home the trophy. Deke's perennial underdogs, Stay Tuned, play up their ability to tap into their emotions in their final effort to win the title. Which voices will rise to the top in perfect harmony?

-1.title: Riff-off: Premiere Trailer
-1.plot:

 Be the first one to add a plot.

imdb.plot outline: About Pitch Slapped Lifetime puts singing in the spotlight with new docuseries "Pitch Slapped" (#PitchSlapped) premiering January 5, 2016 at 10pm ET/PT. The eight hour long episodes reveal what it's really like in the intensely competitive world of high school a cappella. The pressure is on when two crosstown rival teams from New Jersey are given the chance to work with the world's best coaches and face off in weekly competitions, crescendoing in a champion sing off. Vocal powerhouse Deke Sharon ("Pitch Perfect") will stop at nothing to get his team, Stay Tuned from Cherry Hill, to come out of their shells and get them in tune while a cappella rockstar and performance coach Diana Preisler ("Blue Jupiter") guides Highlands Voices from Allendale, to harmonize their way to a win. "Pitch Slapped" is produced by All3Media America and Studio Lambert Associates along with InsomniaTV, who conceptualized the project. The series is executive produced by Stephen Lambert, ("Undercover Boss"), Greg Goldman ("True Tori") and Glenn Schubert in conjunction with Lifetime's Eli Lehrer, Mary Donahue and Colleen Conway Grogan.
